https://openminds.om-i.org/props/anatomi._instruction: Add the anatomical entity that semantically best describes the anatomical location of the pipette tip.

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/anatomi.name: anatomicalLocation

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/chlorid._instruction: Enter all chloride reversal potentials for the intracellular solution(s) of the pipette measured during its use.

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/chlorid.name: chlorideReversalPotential

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/compens._instruction: Enter the compensation current for the series resistance of the pipette measured during its use.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/compens.label: Compensation current
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/compens.name: compensationCurrent

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/device.description: Piece of equipment or mechanism (hardware) designed to serve a special purpose or perform a special function.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/device.label: Device
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/device.name: device

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/endMemb._instruction: Enter the membrane potential of e.g., a patched cell at the end of a recording measured during the use of this pipette.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/endMemb.label: End membrane potential
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/endMemb.name: endMembranePotential

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/holding._instruction: Enter the holding membrane potential of e.g., a patched cell measured during the use of this pipette.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/holding.label: Holding potential
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/holding.name: holdingPotential

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/inputRe._instruction: Enter the input resistance of e.g., a patched cell measured during the use of this pipette.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/inputRe.label: Input resistance
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/inputRe.name: inputResistance

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/labelin._instruction: Add the used compound for labelling e.g., a patched cell during the use of this pipette.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/labelin.label: Labeling compound
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/labelin.name: labelingCompound

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/liquidJ._instruction: Enter the liquid junction potential of e.g., a patched cell measured during the use of this pipette.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/liquidJ.label: Liquid junction potential
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/liquidJ.name: liquidJunctionPotential

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/lookupL._instruction: Enter a lookup label for this device usage that may help you to find this instance more easily.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/lookupL.label: Lookup label
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/lookupL.name: lookupLabel

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/metadat._instruction: Add all files or file bundles containing additional information about the usage of this device.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/metadat.label: Metadata location
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/metadat.name: metadataLocation

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/pipette._instruction: Enter the resistance of the pipette during its use.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/pipette.label: Pipette resistance
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/pipette.name: pipetteResistance

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/pipette._instruction: Enter the solution with which the pipette was filled during its use.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/pipette.label: Pipette solution
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/pipette.name: pipetteSolution

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/sealRes._instruction: Enter the seal resistance of e.g., a patched cell measured during the use of this pipette.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/sealRes.label: Seal resistance
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/sealRes.name: sealResistance

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/seriesR._instruction: Enter the series resistance of the pipette measured during its use.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/seriesR.label: Series resistance
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/seriesR.name: seriesResistance

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/spatial._instruction: Add the coordinate point that best describes the spatial location of the pipette tip during its use.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/spatial.label: Spatial location
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/spatial.name: spatialLocation

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/startMe._instruction: Enter the membrane potential of e.g., a patched cell at the beginning of a recording measured during the use of this pipette.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/startMe.label: Start membrane potential
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/startMe.name: startMembranePotential

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/usedSpe._instruction: Add the state of the tissue sample or subject that this device was used on.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/usedSpe.label: Used specimen
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/usedSpe.name: usedSpecimen
